data.message: Please help my relative veronica pagado palmea. Her account was hacked last September 4 and the hacker is now using another password FOR MODUS of asking money from veronica's friends. Veronica can't anymore open her account because the hacker changed the password. Please arrest this immediately sir if you're reading this.Thanks and God bless!

replies.message: Hey Mike. If your friend can't get into their account because it was taken over by someone else, please tell them to go to the Hacked Accounts section at http://bit.ly/2c7TAf1 to get immediate help. You can also encourage them to visit Privacy Basics at http://bit.ly/2c7U5Wx for tips and guides to help them keep their account secure. -Brad
